findings.details: Newsletter forms now reference helper copy with form-level aria-describedby for clearer context.
Manual scan found no placeholder/example.com links in posts/pages. External URLs not live-checked due to offline audit.
Default layout includes SEO tags, keywords fallback, hreflang, and social image alt metadata.
Homepage and contact copy remain concise and consistent with the portfolio positioning.

recommendations: Run a live link check when network access is available.
Consider adding a short success message for newsletter submissions to reinforce completion.
